mutants.original_line: x_mean = sum(x) / n
mutants.mutated_line: x_mean = sum(x) * n
mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_correlation(x, y):
    n = len(x)
    x_mean = sum(x) * n
    y_mean = sum(y) / n
    x_stddev = math.sqrt(sum(((xi - x_mean) ** 2 for xi in x)) / n)
    y_stddev = math.sqrt(sum(((yi - y_mean) ** 2 for yi in y)) / n)
    correlation = sum(((xi - x_mean) * (yi - y_mean) for (xi, yi) in zip(x, y))) / (n * x_stddev * y_stddev)
    return round(correlation, 4)

mutants.mutated_line: x_mean = sum(x) // n

import math

def calculate_correlation(x, y):
    n = len(x)
    x_mean = sum(x) / n
    y_mean = sum(y) / n
    x_stddev = math.sqrt(sum(((xi - x_mean) ** 2 for xi in x)) / n)
    y_stddev = math.sqrt(sum(((yi - y_mean) ** -2 for yi in y)) / n)
    correlation = sum(((xi - x_mean) * (yi - y_mean) for (xi, yi) in zip(x, y))) / (n * x_stddev * y_stddev)
    return round(correlation, 4)
